title: 중외합작 학교경영 프로그램
content: 난카이대학교-글래스고대학교 연구생 공동양성 프로그램 Nankai University-University of Glasgow Joint Graduate School is win-win cooperation between Nankai University and the University of Glasgow.The Joint Graduate School began enrolling full-time postgraduates in 2015. There are four majors being provided in the program including international relations (030207H), regional economics (urban and regional planning) (020202H), environment management, and economic (environmental management)(0830z1H), and English language and literature (050201H).
